website_summaries.verdict: The Retro-Bit RDP is one of the few portable consoles available that’s both fully licensed by Nintendo and works with original NES and SNES cartridges. If you’ve got an attic full of classic Nintendo games, this is the console you want.
pros: In addition to working with older Nintendo cartridges, it also accepts original SEGA Genesis games
cons: It doesn’t have any built-in games, so you’ll have to bring your own cartridges
The screen is pretty small, and the cartridges are big, so it can be awkward to hold while playing

customer_reviews.title: Too much empty space in Cartridge slot
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed by this little machine, the screen is clear and the buttons feel good and are extremely responsive with seemingly no delay whatsoever. However one issue that seems to be present in all versions of this is that if you move too much while playing the cartridge wiggles a bit in the slot and tends to freeze. On that note if you stick something else in the slot to fill up the empty space the issue is fixed. Please make the cartridge slot a bit skinnier in the future if you can, otherwise fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: connor meaney

customer_reviews.title: Portable SNES...enough said
customer_reviews.text: This product gets a 5 star rating because, it's SNES in the palm of your hands! It comes with: charging cord, A/V cord(red, white, yellow), 2nd controller adapter, NES adapter that allows NES cartridges to be played(I haven't tried yet). The cartridge pictured contains 110 SNES classics. Battery life lasts quite awhile, so it turns long, boring car trips into short, fun trips. I am super pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Strasburg

customer_reviews.title: Playing it is fantastic. We pulled out our NES games and had ...
customer_reviews.text: Playing it is fantastic. We pulled out our NES games and had a blast. The adaptor with the NES game is rather bulky though and will glitch or crash if it gets shaken. Going to try folding a piece of paper to secure it more. No save function and you need controllers to play two people. Overall though, we are really happy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Varkey

customer_reviews.title: but the return process worked well and was pretty quick. I ordered a new one and it ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received didn't work, but the return process worked well and was pretty quick. I ordered a new one and it works fine. I love playing these retro games, anywhere! You still have to blow on the cartridges to get the dust out so it works, but it runs like the old systems. It also holds a charge for a good amount of time, though I haven't run it out yet. I'd say it lasts a few hours. Overall, I'm happy with it. I just had to deduct a star since the first one I ordered didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: AmznUser181921

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING!
customer_reviews.text: It really works. The quality is there. You do not even need to do the paper/cardboard insert. I wish they have N64 and Gamecube. Also have Gameboy, Gameboy Color and Gameboy Advance in one would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Mikols

customer_reviews.title: A simple game like Pac-Man is hard to make the turns
customer_reviews.text: The left direction pad is small and doesn’t work change directions very well. You can’t pivot directions because if you press on the center the whole thing goes in pressing all four directions at the same time. A simple game like Pac-Man is hard to make the turns.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: That it sound louder and that it functions with tv
customer_reviews.text: Well i don't like sound power it's to low barely can hear itand it doesn't want to work with the tv when using the nintendo adopter nintendo one cartridge it works finge with super nintendo cartridges but not to good with nintendo one it has good picture quality just two problems sound power and Nintendo one to tv won't work at all just with the small screen only.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick m santos

customer_reviews.title: Fun device, but it can easily corrupt save files ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun device, but it can easily corrupt save files if bumped. I would recommend doing a reset of whatever game you're playing before turning off the console. Definitely turns some heads as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ngerecitano

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I bought a super Mario world cartridge on Amazon to play in this controller (it's compatible!) and it was great playing that game again! I haven't played SMW since I was 9. This is the coolest gaming device I've played in a long time. If your looking for a bit of nostalgia, then buy this controller!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle DeVincent

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my special needs son’s birthday so he got it on Sept. 27th. It’s had trouble holding a charge the last few days and today will no longer hold any charge. It works if it’s plugged in while he’s playing with it, but I don’t like to do that because he’s a little rough on the charger cord. But it should last longer than a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Margie L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Cartridges don't fit snug,  Any sudden movement and you will lose your game and need to reset.
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived very quickly. It has some issues where if you don't hold the thing perfectly straight you are going to lose your game. I've played a few portable SNES types like this which one had the same issue and the other did not. If your serious about binging games this may make it a bit difficult, especially on games that don't let you save often
customer_reviews.author: Ryley Costello

customer_reviews.title: super nintendo and gameboy if you have the right SNES ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest gaming systems I own. It plays nintendo, super nintendo and gameboy if you have the right SNES cartridge
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Power

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept but has kinks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for Christmas because she wanted something to play that she can take with her and also be used on the TV. It work fine but the thing is for some reason after a while the screen will it go off but you still hear the game sound. so therefore it's nice when it works
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W

customer_reviews.title: Blast from the past
customer_reviews.text: I have only played it in handheld mode to test it out before wrapping it for a gift, let me say: it brought me back 20 years! I plugged in Solar Jetman (one of my favorites) and it was like being 15 again. I can't wait to plug in SNES classics like Zelda and see it on the big screen with controllers in my hand! I knew there was a reason I held on to my old titles. Well worth the money if you love your old titles.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Not all games play on it.
customer_reviews.text: Not all of my games work on it. The Hyperkin one was a better buy. All games work on it. Plus the screen on this one doesnt get bright at all. 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Games crash when ever I move even slightly.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with my retro-bit duo portable. Everytime that I move even slightly, my retro-bit duo portable crashes. It worked fine for a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my SNES loving gamer sister. She loved it! She was able to play her favorite SNES games on the go and it even has a decent battery life. Plus the ability to hook it up to your TV and use it as an SNES makes it so much more versatile. I have to admit I was even a little jealous of how cool this thing turned out!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nek

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this! I got it as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend. At first, since he got a Wii U from his parents, he never took it out of the box. But me being a gamer myself I began playing it and was having a blast. He then saw me having a good time and started pulling out his old Mega Man, Super Mario Kart, etc games and was having a good time. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Martin

customer_reviews.title: Snes or Nes anytime anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: If you ever wanted to play your snes games on the go this is for you. Or maybe you're like me and got it just to use around the house? Either way this is a must buy if you love snes games and if like me had about 50 cartridges laying aroud you should get one of these. Yes they can play NES and SNES right out of the box but playing nes games makes a huge tower stick out the top of it and makes it top heavy. There is also an additional adapter to play genesis games on this device.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Hmm... well...
customer_reviews.text: It could be great but there are some compatibility issues with certain games. I was unable to finish a certain dungeon in Mario World, it would lock up every time I completed the level. There are other games that have similar issues and it can be very frustrating. If that doesn't bother you I'd say go ahead and grab one, they're pretty cool disregarding the compatibility issues.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Will Function as You Expect (Which is a great thing!)
customer_reviews.text: The screen is a little dark and lacks vibrancy, but it's not a dealbreaker. Overall, this is a great device.
customer_reviews.author: Jared H.

customer_reviews.title: Great handheld
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with this is that the left and right bumpers are in an awkward place. It’d be better if the bumpers were behind the cartridge slot rather than in front
customer_reviews.author: luis campa

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome!  Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worked with Chrono Trigger/FF6, Aliens 3, Doom, Donkey Kong Country, Super Mario bros, Gradius and more and more, haven't found a game that doesn't work! Totally recommended, people complain about the D-pad, but I haven't had a single problem with it, it feels good on hand(maybe not best for fighting games like Street Fighter 2 and MKII) but it does it all, really a nice head-turner, buttons feel great and it comes will all the connectors to make it work on the Television! I'm getting the two wire-less controllers next time! Very Satisfied, looks slick!
customer_reviews.author: Mars D.

customer_reviews.title: A much loved device for car travel
customer_reviews.text: A much loved device for car travel. Used for many hours without issues. Strong and somewhat obnoxious plastic smell, even several months after purchase. Be aware if you're susceptible to such things. My gamester doesn't mind, but I don't like the smell, at all. Cracking a window solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Not Happy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend. He was overjoyed and has since went on to say that it is the single best gift he every received. The battery lasts for several hours and does not, in his experience, over heat. It has played every game put in it, including the japanese version which has a slightly different case. I will definitely be getting one for myself soon. Absolutely love it. If you are looking for that perfect gift in your gamers life get this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica davis

customer_reviews.title: ... doesn't work at all and the nes cart will easily slip or fall out of it
customer_reviews.text: snes carts work but the retroport adapter it comes with for nes carts doesn't work at all and the nes cart will easily slip or fall out of it.Do not buy this if you want to play nes games with it since the retroport doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: shaun michalowski

customer_reviews.title: This devise is amazing it plays well but
customer_reviews.text: This devise is amazing it plays well but, I have an issue my speakers came really scratchy... Even when I plug in headphones it sounds like a buzz, I'll keep the device but i'm hoping the buzz goes away! Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Get Smurfedd

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works half the time and will not work with any snes games. The adapter with nes games are the only games that work. The games are very loose and wiggle which produces inconsistent video.

customer_reviews.title: great product if you are willing to deal with a little buggs.
customer_reviews.text: this is a great item. its a little buggy but i get mos games working fine without much hassle. the built in controls feel comfortable and it is responsive. i chose this system over the supaboy or the yobo for the fact that this system can play nes and genesis games as well. the biggest tipping point that led me to the rdp v2 over the others is the battery life.

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: If you slightly shake it, it corrupts or glitches your game. This is terrible. Do not buy this.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is so affordable. Did not care for the charging port being loose so you have to “work” the charging cable in position.

customer_reviews.title: Would say try a supaboy

I tried contacting the company by email but theyes never responded, all I got was a automatic response saying they will contact me in a few days but the never did

customer_reviews.text: NES GAMES FREEZE AFTER 30-60 SECONDS. Hoping SNES games will work better.

customer_reviews.title: The SNES portion works great though.
customer_reviews.text: The NES extension doesn't work. You can see the game, but there are lines all through it no matter what you do. The SNES portion works great though.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what you want it to do. Very enjoyable.

customer_reviews.title: This thing kicks azz!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that playing the NES games can be a little uncomfortable. As far as SNES games go, the RetroDuo rocks! Great picture quality, great battery life, great sound, and great fun for everyone! I believe everyone should have one.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Works as promised. Very well build and it's a real treat to go back and play those old cartridges. Picture resolution is very good.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product for families with children
customer_reviews.text: This console worked really well for a few weeks, but then stopped working. Games it showed clearly prior to that time no longer play in any viewable way. It's a VERY sensitive system and has become unusable for my family.

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, poorly executed.

customer_reviews.title: All arrived in good condition very nice product
customer_reviews.text: All arrived in good condition very nice product. The only bad thing I could say, you have to pay attention to the cartridge to not shake it when you play otherwise it crashes the console

customer_reviews.title: So happy I stumbled upon this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when I ordered this because of similar products I have seen.......But, I'm So happy I have it. I've had none of the issues others have talked about. If you were used to the issues of the original nes/snes (you know...blowing on the game first)there isn't a problem. Bottom line....I have enjoyed it since I took it out of the box!!!! Well worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Blow

customer_reviews.title: Back in time
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome retro toy to enjoy for both adult and child! So happy we found this and were able to use it with the designed games!

customer_reviews.title: The nes adapter can be picky on when it wants ...
customer_reviews.text: The nes adapter can be picky on when it wants the d pad and buttons to work but eventually if pushed in well enough the buttons will work

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product overall
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product overall! Allows you to feel again that magic of playing NES and SUPER NES games at every time and everywhere 'cause you don't have to be force to use a TV to play. I love it!

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the RDP v2.0 since June and have only played it sparingly for Sega Genesis games. However, it performs exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hazelwood

customer_reviews.title: A Must for Retro Gaming Fans
customer_reviews.text: A slick gaming device for every 90's kid on the planet. I love taking this thing on trips and catching up on old SNES/NES titles I never could find as a kid. Good battery life and awesome features, what more could you ask for? A real head turner.
customer_reviews.author: Final Boss

customer_reviews.title: freezes
customer_reviews.text: It sure freezes a hell of a lot kind of sucks

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's a very cool idea, and the gift was very well-recieved by ...
customer_reviews.text: The screw to attach the oldest NES adapter isn't nearly long enough to actually thread and hold it in place. I'm hoping I can find another screw to replace that with because without the adapter being screwed in, the device doesn't pick up the game. It's definitely clunky (size-wise) for a handheld, but that's just because the games themselves are big. Overall it's a very cool idea, and the gift was very well-recieved by my video-game-loving wife.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: two times returned and still don't work
customer_reviews.text: i wanted to love this but after returning it for the sec time i dont...it does not work and i hate having to return it i will be trying one more time and if its broken again i will getting my money back this sucks i wanted this game very bad. so if you want to try you mite have better luck then me but i say don't try but thats up to you...i will let you know if the third one works when i get it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Hollen Freeman

customer_reviews.title: I recomend it if you want to play mario or rpgs on the go!
customer_reviews.text: The console is very sturdy and well built, its been able to play the games that I own now perfectly (Mario all stars, f-zero, goof troop, and final fantasy mystic quest) the battery life is excellent (compared to my Nintendo 3ds) but I can do away with the cheap smell of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: jose ariza

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh not well made at all.
customer_reviews.text: A really nice idea and sounds great, but this particular product has a lot of faults. - Screen goes black if console is moved too quickly - I personally bought two units and both had defective and static filled speakers. - A lot bulkier than expected. However, when being used on a tv it seems to hold up well. So using it as a regular SNES, NES system hooked up to the tv works out but as a portable system def not.
customer_reviews.author: Amalik

customer_reviews.title: Device came with a dead pixel on the screen. ...
customer_reviews.text: Device came with a dead pixel on the screen. When I tried to connect the device to the TV, its showed up and worked, but the picture on the TV was very shaky, however the picture on the device was still. Not sure if this is a common problem or an issue with the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it claims to!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first, based on other reviews. But I was pleasantly surprised that the device does exactly what it says it will. It plays all my Super Famicom and SNES titles like a champ and haven't had any problems at all. It feels nice in my hands and the controls are responsive. If I have a problem ,its the NES adapter. It works don't get me wrong, but it sticks out so far its really kinda makes it a stay at home device rather then a portable. But I got it to play my favorite classic games in bed and it works perfectly for that purpose. I think this is a great little device and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Maggio

customer_reviews.title: It is near perfect..
customer_reviews.text: It is near perfect... All NES and SNES games even when they were in style would always have problems loading half the time. This loads more often, THAT BEING SAID, Mine does not like the game to be plugged all the way in half the time either. But there is a screw that you can put in the back to hold the game still when the adapter for NES is plugged in.... I suggest using it to hold the SNES as well just don't tighten it too much. Hope for the best as it is still better than sitting in front of the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product.I had been searching for something portable that would allow me to play multiple platforms and this is perfect. Fits nicely in my hands, the screen is bright and sharp and the sound is excellent as long as the game cartridge is in good condition! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: High price, low quality--dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This item is VERY cheaply made. It's aquality is low. Switches and volume do not work properly, product is made entirely of CHEAP plastic and feels like a child's toy. The buttons aren't responsive. Cartridges are a VERY tight fit and switching from SNES to NES games seems to short the system. Eventually you won't be able to switch between the two without forcing the cartridge into the connector and actually holding it down to play. The screen shorts out depending on how you hold the device. It's overpriced for the quality. I returned mine the next day when it didn't work new out of the box. It's around $90 but it isn't worth $20!
customer_reviews.author: regionalGirl137

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Plays nice as a handheld and awesome when hooked up to the TV. Good graphics, battery holds its charge well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If this is what you need, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun product. It's a little big but it needs to be to fit the cartridges. The battery lasts a really long time and it's great to play on. The only negatives are it's obviously not made like a real name brand product. If you move it too much while playing it freezes up. It helps to stick something credit card size in with the cart so it doesn't move so much. I had to get two of these. The first had a dead pixels and mostly didn't work at all. The 2nd one is great and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: Sweet for Snes
customer_reviews.text: Best screen quality for snes ever, and nes also. Battery strong, light weight and av out, but a little bit hard direction button and not convenient L,R button.
customer_reviews.author: Hyun Jin Jung

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product to play a classic game. Sometimes it reacts sensitively.
customer_reviews.author: Hong Wonki

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone who likes the old nintendos
customer_reviews.text: Great for anyone who likes the old nintendos. Screen is pretty big and has great color. easy to use and works with all of my old games. Get the Genesis Adapter and you will always have your reto games to play on the go. Even came with a cable to hookup to the TV so great if you no longer have the consuls but still have the games. Also came with a controller for TV use.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It's excellent!!! I love it!!! I can take my Nintendo on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Hill

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Screen isn't very bright, bent pin on literally the first game I put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my boyfriend for his birthday. It did erase a game he had saved from long ago, but he was about to start one anyway, since it was so old. It seemed like some freak thing because it has only happened once. Otherwise, it has been pretty awesome. And I am now considered the most thoughtful girlfriend ever.
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product and will exceed your expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter Michelle. It's a great product and will exceed your expectations, Thank you Retro-bit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pena

customer_reviews.title: Best Mobile games ever
customer_reviews.text: Love the little retro duo. New to game collecting so this is great for on the go fun. Like snes sims city
customer_reviews.author: Alex DeHart

customer_reviews.title: Retro Duo Portible
customer_reviews.text: Whether it's worth the money or not, you will have to decide. I will highlight the pros and cons for you. Pros. It's packed well. It's sleek and clean. It's a must have for on the go gamers. Cons. The sound is very minimum and hard to hear unless your using head phones or ear buds. The screen doesn't get very bright. It's very inconvenient on the go to have to carry a screw driver to change out the adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Snelling

customer_reviews.title: Needs work but still cool
customer_reviews.text: Similar to the original super SNES if you wiggle the game it will freeze the screen which seems like something that could easily be fixed wedging a piece of cardboard in between the game and the system seems to work so far
customer_reviews.author: elijah

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product didn't work. Very dissatisfied as it was to be a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: kdear23

customer_reviews.title: works but has some issues
customer_reviews.text: i bought this and it works with all the nes and snes games i own. but ive been having problems with the saves. the system deletes all the save data for slot number 1 for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: yadira velez

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Have not had any problem with it, so far plays all my 12 games, it is great to play all Nintendo games again in a portable game system.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Elvira

customer_reviews.title: it feels like I have to use excessive force to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a couple of fixable problems. One is the nes adapter that is included with the system; it's gigantic and makes the system somewhat unwieldy. Another is when you want to remove a game, it feels like I have to use excessive force to get it out. It makes me worry for the safety of the console and the game itself. The last real problem is the controller built onto the system. It feels rather cheap and does not give you the best control over the game. Fortunately an adapter is included so you can use an actual controller, I'd recommend using that.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: bad ass !
customer_reviews.text: just fantastic ! it plays the oldies like the original one but can be bring in plane or train (or the office !).
customer_reviews.author: pierre cixous

customer_reviews.title: Speakers are garbage
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy. With what you spend i hoped for better speakers. Definitely need to change that. Lower the price since you know we have to buy headphones to use it. Honestly with the price like this include a pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT & STEPH

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!  Plays Starfox perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Yes the NES adapter is super goofy but it works wonderfully. More importantly -- this thing plays Starfox! Perfectly. Every time. I've only had it for a few days but as long as it proves to be durable I will continue to be more than pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Robokeith

customer_reviews.title: Love the console, great customer service but
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered it it came in a very timely manner. It came a lot sooner than expected. I had issues with the console not saving files so they sent me a new one without any questions before they even got the one I sent back. The rep was fast replying with my questions from email.when they sent me a new one the sound wasn't as great of quality as first one. Over all I loved the console maybe I just got a bad batch
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: I'd LOVE this thing...if it actually worked.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it back in November, immediately checked it with a few games to see if t worked. All was well. Put it back in it's box, put it in my nightstand. And there it sat for a few months, untouched, perfectly preserved in its box like it would be had it been sitting on a store shelf this whole time, until yesterday when I bought a few SNES games and decided to finally play it. Does't work anymore. No idea why. It's literally been sitting in its box in a tempetature-friendly room for months. I've tried several games, nothing. Total crap. Shame, I was really excited to finally use it too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Alcalde

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When your playing the game if you touch the back it cuts off.
customer_reviews.author: S.George

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a difference between the first and second version. Only thing I could find was someone mentioning the buttons are different and something added to increase durability or something. I bought the second version based on that but unknown to me it did not come with the retro controllers, just the controller adapter, which isn't an issue for me since I have my old Super Nintendo controllers. But still a slight disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Cupoy

customer_reviews.title: The graphics are good and it feels alright in your hands but it ...
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are good and it feels alright in your hands but it seems to freeze everytime you're playing a game, which is problematic considering half of the snes games out there are single run games so be prepared to start over
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: It works as described, exact the volume switch doesn't work after only two months of use... it is on LOUD permanently which can make it inconvenient to play!
customer_reviews.author: juliem

customer_reviews.title: Woohoo!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun! I love being able to play old SNES games. I wish this game with an adapter to connect two controllers, but you have to buy the cable separately as I understand it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: My games keep erasing and the loose cartridge keeps resetting the system.
customer_reviews.author: blanketbunny

customer_reviews.title: Works great, however we haven't gotten a chance to try ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, however we haven't gotten a chance to try any NES games because we can't get them to fit the adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Golden

customer_reviews.title: no sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: my product did not work right there is no sound!!! i would stay with snes system better...i want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Juan garcia

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on most SNES PAL Australian cartridges.
customer_reviews.text: Console does not on a lot of PAL SNES cartridges from Australia. When some work they play up or freezers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, but had a dead pixel on the screen
customer_reviews.author: joshua hill

customer_reviews.title: Do your research
customer_reviews.text: I bought the retro duo portable not expecting perfection. The item arrived brand new. Right off the bat I found dead pixels on the screen. Take what the YouTube gaming channels have to say about the unit with a grain of salt. As most were given the red version for free. I really wanted this to work. I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Beercocker

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. Do not believe 5 star reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very sorry to say this product didn't work at all when I received it. I was so excited to give this as a gift and to hear it didn't work was extremely disappointing. Please don't believe the 5 star reviews as they all sound templeted.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality system
customer_reviews.text: This system broke in less than ten months and the service website listed never responds. It was horribly disappointing to my daughter as we purchased several games. Do not buy this product as they do not stand by it.
customer_reviews.author: linda s.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: PErfect console, good sound, tried the AV out and works PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crunshii

customer_reviews.title: super lame.
customer_reviews.text: The device ran out of juice and I lost the charger. I have repeatedly reached out the the manufacturer asking where I can get a replacement charger without any response. There's no customer service, super lame.
customer_reviews.author: Toob

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolute crap. Games have a hard time loading, even after they were cleaned. When they do load, they are either extremely blurry or the colors are off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complete dissapointment...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas, the moment he turned it on their was a dead pixel. So, we were already thinking about sending it back. Within 10 minutes of playing it was glitching, freezing and crashing. Returned the day that it was received. Considering its $30.00 more on amazon then the site selling them, they should probably make sure they work.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Yount

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but some games doesn't
customer_reviews.text: The V2 has a better screen Some games doesn't work only few with my test it's a very good super nintendo portable for 80s people
customer_reviews.author: BOURREE BENOIT

customer_reviews.title: Good Device - Bad Seller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as brand new, however the item came to me in a state of new but had been tampered with. The box's seals had been cut and the adapter's plastic baggie had been opened as had the power cable. The actually device was like new but did not work perfectly. the screen often flickered and i could not play an actually game for more than 30 seconds. The games worked fine on my other snes systems, so it had to be the device. I am in middle of returning this item and filing a complaint. Beware buying from Deal Cavern as a seller.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Baker

customer_reviews.title: Zero no stars horrible I was really looking forward to it but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Zero no stars horrible I was really looking forward to it but I let me down the d-pad I guess there's a manufacturer's defect in it which they have to fix I tried getting a different system in the same problem arose maybe in the near future when day redesign the system and the d-pad Maybe if not I tell you to customers do not buy it buy something else
customer_reviews.author: Ruben a.

customer_reviews.title: Repair goods when new product to sell
customer_reviews.text: The description is not entirely new traces have been trampled The machine can not adjust the sound The screen has a bad point!
customer_reviews.author: QDeep

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to device to work but all I ended up being was disappointed. Perhaps in the further when the tech gets better I will buy anther one but as of right now I have already returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

product_meta.title: Retro-Bit RDP 2 in 1 Portable Handheld Console System - for NES and SNES Games - Black
product_meta.description: Have the desire to play your original NES & SNES game cartridges while ON THE GO?! The Retro Duo Portable handheld console by Retro-Bit allows you to play your 16-bit, 8-bit, and even original Genesis cartridges both on your TV and on the road! With up to eight hours of playtime from the equipped dual-capacity rechargeable lithium-ion battery, the RDP is the perfect choice for retro gamer road trips. This portable handheld device is mobile and travel-friendly, so you can show off your old-school gaming skills everywhere you go!
feature_bullets: Compatible with 8-bit Original NES games (with included cartridge adapter)
Dual capacity lithium-ion battery gives upto 8hrs of uninterrupted game play
Includes: RetroDuo Portable Console, RetroPort NES Game Adapter, Standard AV cable, AC Power Adapter, Console Stand

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars275 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
